meanings.definition: The first public appearance or performance of something.
meanings.sent1: Her debut on stage was a big success.
meanings.sent2: The singer's debut album was well-received by fans.
meanings.sent3: At the school talent show, his debut as a magician left everyone amazed.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise made its debut over the horizon, painting the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The debut of the new technology revolutionized the industry overnight.

meanings.definition: To make a first public appearance or performance.
meanings.sent1: She will debut her new dance routine at the recital.
meanings.sent2: The band will debut their latest song at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The puppy decided to debut his tricks just as the guests arrived.
meanings.sent4: The flowers will debut their vibrant colors in the spring.
meanings.sent5: The chef will debut his signature dish at the food festival.
